  • Methodendetails

    • findByBusinessUnitsContains

      Optional<Company> findByBusinessUnitsContains(BusinessUnit businessUnit)
      Searches for a Company containing a certain BusinessUnit
      Parameter:
      businessUnit - BusinessUnit filtered for
      Gibt zurück:
      Optional containing a Company containing businessUnit or NULL

    • findByOkrSetsContains

      Optional<Company> findByOkrSetsContains(OKRSet okrSet)
      Searches for a Company containing a certain OKRSet
      Parameter:
      okrSet - OKRSet filtered for
      Gibt zurück:
      Optional containing a Company containing okrSet or NULL

    • deleteByUuid

      Optional<Company> deleteByUuid(UUID id)
      Deletes Company corresponding to the given ID
      Parameter:
      id - UUID to be deleted
      Gibt zurück:
      Optional containing the deleted Company or NULL
